How do I access the Frequently Asked Questions section for Linux users?

There is no indication of a section for Linux users. The available FAQs are related to Windows command line formatting, Windows pool-mining on low priority, and standard locations for Verus-Desktop installations on Windows.

Is there a single, comprehensive FAQ section that covers all Verus-related topics?
There is no single, comprehensive FAQ section that covers all Verus-related topics. The FAQs are organized into separate sections, each focusing on a specific topic or platform.
